scam_examples.title: Treasury Scam Call
scam_examples.text: Hello, this is Agent Johnson from the US Treasury Department. Your Social Security number has been suspended due to suspicious activity. You need to purchase $500 in Target gift cards immediately and provide the card numbers to avoid arrest. Do not discuss this with anyone or contact the police. Call me back at 555-SCAM-123 within 30 minutes or a sheriff will come to your house.

scam_examples.title: Fake Bank Email
scam_examples.text: URGENT: Your account has been compromised. Click this link immediately to secure your account: http://fake-bank-security.com/login. Enter your username, password, and social security number to verify your identity. You have 24 hours or your account will be permanently closed.

legitimate_examples.title: Real Utility Company
legitimate_examples.text: This is a reminder that your Puget Sound Energy account ending in 4567 has a past due balance of $127.34 with a due date of March 15th. You can pay online at pse.com, mail a check to the address on your bill, or call our customer service line at 1-888-225-5773. We never ask customers to pay with gift cards or wire transfers.

legitimate_examples.title: Bank Security Alert
legitimate_examples.text: We detected unusual activity on your account. For your security, we have temporarily restricted online access. Please visit your local branch with photo ID or call the number on the back of your card. Never share your login details with anyone, and we will never ask for your full PIN or password over the phone.
